column1: Table 12. Mean maximum sentence length and mean total time expected to serve, by mental health status and offense
report title: Mental Health Problems of Prison and Jail Inmates  NCJ 213600
data source: Survey of Inmates in State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 2004; Survey of Inmates in Local Jails, 2002
authors: Doris J. James and Lauren E. Glaze
Table 12. Mean maximum sentence length and mean total time expected to serve, by mental health status and offense

column8: Mean total time expected to serve until release/b

column1: a/Based on the total maximum sentence for all consecutive sentences. Excludes inmates for whom offense was unknown.
b/Based on time served when interviewed and time to be served until the expected date of release. Excludes inmates for whom admission date or expected release date were unknown.
